member.name: IDirectManipulationViewportEventHandler.OnContentUpdated
member.summary: Called when content inside a viewport is updated.
member.param: The content in the viewport that has changed.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationViewportEventHandler.OnViewportStatusChanged
member.summary: Called when the status of a viewport changes.
member.param: The viewport for which status has changed.
The new status of the viewport.
The previous status of the viewport.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationViewportEventHandler.OnViewportUpdated
member.summary: Called after all content in the viewport has been updated.
member.param: The viewport that has been updated.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
